sentences.en: A seismic sense could help to explain certain types of elephant behaviour.
sentences.cn: 震动感知能力可以帮助解释大象的某些行为.

sentences.en: a seismic shift in the political process
Due to seismic requirements, brick houses generally 5 layer, 6 layer below.
sentences.cn: 由于抗震的要求, 砖混住宅一般在5层 、 6层以下.

sentences.en: Financial seismic sea wave brings enormous obtain employment pressure to college graduate.
sentences.cn: 金融海啸给高校毕业生带来巨大的就业压力.
越来越频繁的地震活动

sentences.en: Keywords: ambient vibration measurement, seismic capacity, RC buildings, regression.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 微振量测 、 耐震能力 、 钢筋混凝土建筑物 、?归分析.

sentences.en: Seismic analysis is very important to the safety evaluation of ship lock.
sentences.cn: 船闸的抗震分析是船闸安全评价的重要内容.

sentences.en: Similarly, the more stretched tight seismic wind resistance is also the worse.
sentences.cn: 同样道理, 绷得越紧,抗风抗震也越差.

sentences.en: Spielberg can't be blamed for that seismic shift in the industry.
sentences.cn: 电影产业不能责怪史匹伯所引起的重大电影变革.

sentences.en: The discovery of abnormal pre - seismic phenomena, a great leap in perceptual knowledge.
sentences.cn: 震前异常现象的发现具有极高的科学价值, 是感性认识上的重大飞跃.

sentences.en: The seismic subduction zones have shown signs of rapid movement recently.
sentences.cn: 那板块沉淀区最近有急剧的移动.

sentences.en: The Y - eccentrically braced steel frame has excellent seismic resistance and energy - dissipation.
sentences.cn: 型偏心支撑钢框架具有很好的抗震耗能能力.

sentences.en: These conclusions can provide reference for seismic design of Xiamen area.
sentences.cn: 以上结论可为厦门地区抗震设计提供参考.

sentences.en: These wells should provide data related to possible pre - seismic, co - seismic, or post - seismic water level fluctuations.
sentences.cn: 这些井可提供震前, 震中或震后水位升降的资料.

sentences.en: We can imagine a seismic detector being bombarded by myriads of grains of sand.
sentences.cn: 我们可以想像检波器受几万个砂粒冲击的情景.

sentences.en: When towing a streamer a seismic ship must avoid stopping, making sharp turns.
sentences.cn: 当船拖曳拖缆时,应避免停驶, 不作急转弯.
